item.title: Converting an android project to kotlin
item.description: This is a small write-up of my experiences from converting a native android-app from java to kotlin. TLDR; Convert the project using android studio Handle nullability-compilation errors Android annotations build script apply lateinit on @ViewById Convert your data-objects into small classes, go for immutable classes Kotlin is cool, and immutability rocks. Bugs in android-studio shows that it is still early days for kotlin-development on android. Convert your project!
